A '''block of raw gold''', internally known as a '''raw gold block''', is a [[raw metal block]] equivalent to nine [[raw gold]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Blocks of raw gold can be mined only with an [[iron pickaxe]] or better.

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Block of Raw Gold|Pickaxe|Iron}}

== Usage ==
Blocks of raw gold are a compact way to store [[raw gold]]. They cannot be [[smelt]]ed into a [[block of gold]].

=== Crafting ingredient ===
{{crafting usage|Block of Raw Gold}}

=== Piglins ===
[[Piglin]]s run toward any block of raw gold item on the ground and inspect it for 6 seconds {{in|java}} or 8 seconds {{in|bedrock}}<ref>{{bug|MCPE-99448||Piglins need 8 seconds to barter, while they only need 6 in java}}</ref> before putting it in their inventory. They become enraged if the player breaks a block of raw gold near them.
